About Me

Hi! I'm currently a Computational Media major at the Georgia Institute of Technology, I'm a Computational Media specializing in people and interactive design.

I'm interested in UX/UI Design, UX Research, and some coding. Outside of the classroom, I enjoy exploring the city of Atlanta and going on a lot of tasty adventures. Above all, I enjoy bothering my friends and going out for bubble tea.
